summary: GRE Vocabulary Builder app with flashcards, practice tests, progress tracking, daily notifications, and offline database of 3000+ GRE words
known_issues: Words list is empty and needs to be populated with 3000 GRE words

existing_features.title: Implement flashcard system that displays a word and allows users to reveal the definition, with ability to navigate between cards
Create practice test feature that quizzes users on vocabulary with multiple choice questions and immediate feedback
Implement progress tracking system that records user performance, tracks words learned, and displays statistics over time
Add daily notification system that reminds users to study vocabulary at a configurable time

Design a clean, modern interface with a cohesive visual theme using warm academic colors (burgundy, cream, forest green), serif typography for vocabulary words, and card-based layouts that emphasize readability and focus

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a backend data model to store GRE vocabulary words with fields for word, definition, part of speech, example sentence, difficulty level, and category
Populate the backend vocabulary database with 3000 GRE words, including for each word: the word itself, definition, part of speech, example sentence, difficulty level, and category
